resources.string: Plan our meet will send an sms on this number for verification.
Please confirm your country code and your phone number
Please Check the phone number again, it should be 10 digit long
Please Check the pin number again , it should be 5 digit long
If the number is of the same device, sit back and relax! Please wait for some 15 seconds for sms to be sent to your phone
Enter the 5 digit pin sent via sms
